create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup the [Home Assistant game event]({overwolf_url}) app in Overwolf. 

 Fill in the following info when asked for the target URL: 

 - `{webhook_url}` 

 See [the documentation]({docs_url}) on how to configure automations to handle incoming data.
